Ships: Ships increase the Stellics gained per scavage, and may decrease the cooldown. Upgrading ships increases the fuel efficiency and reduces the cooldown between salvages.

Atlas.description: The ship that you crash landed here in. Banged up, but capable of small journeys to collect Stellics.

Planets: Planets increase the chance of finding artifacts during searches, and may decrease the cooldown. Upgrading planets increases the infrastructure, and enables you to find more hidden gems.

Statan.description: The ghost planet you crash landed into. Empty and void of life, this island lacks much opportunity for treasure.
